Name: Total time for SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases originating from the variant containing \Assign a Different Editor\
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'Assign a Different Editor occurs

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time it takes for SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to occur after SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation when preceded by at least two SW-Reviewer Agreed events in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs

Name: Total time spent in SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation for cases that include the variant ending with SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'SW-EIC Accept occurs

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants involving major revisions
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases where SW-Reviewer No Response also occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response occurs

Name: Average time until SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation is performed after the last SW-Reviewer Agreed in a case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time from the final SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in complex reviewer assignment variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in manuscripts that underwent multiple rounds of revision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurs

Name: Total time for SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases originating from the variant containing Assign a Different Editor
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'Assign a Different Editor occurs

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to be done after all required reviewers have agreed (i.e., after the last SW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and the subsequent editorial decision activity (e.g., SW-Awaiting EIC Decision) in high-performance versus low-performance variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
